title: Roscoe Mitchell - Bells For The South Side (2017)
description: Roscoe Mitchell Bells For The South Side 2017 - ECM Records: ECM 2494/95 http://www.ecmrecords.com/catalogue/1486477600 * Roscoe Mitchell: sopranino saxophone, soprano saxophone, alto saxophone, bass saxophone, flute, piccolo flute, bass recorder, percussion * James Fei : sopranino saxophone, alto saxophone, contra alto clarinet, electronics * William Winant : percussion, tubular bells, glockenspiel, vibraphone, marimba, roto toms, cymbals, bass drum, woodblocks, timpani * Hugh Ragin : trumpet, piccolo trumpet * Tyshawn Sorey : trombone, piano, drums, percussion * Craig Taborn : piano, organ, electronics * Kikanju Baku : drums, percussion * Jaribu Shahid : double bass, bass guitar, percussion * Tani Tabbal : drums, percussion http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roscoe_Mitchell http://www.allmusic.com/artist/roscoe-mitchell-mn0000015750 Recorded by David Zuchowski at Museum of Contemporary Art Chicago, Chicago, Cook County, Illinois, United States, on September 2015, on the occasion of the AACM’s 50th anniversary. http://www.aacmchicago.org/ Reviews ~~~~~~~ By Martin Schray http://www.freejazzblog.org/2017/08/roscoe-mitchell-bells-for-south-side.html By Derek Taylor Tor Hammerø (no) http://torhammero.blogg.no/1499968664_en_legende_leverer.html Dionizy Piątkowski (pl) http://jazz.pl/roscoe-mitchell-bells-for-the-south-side-ecm-records/ Németh Attila (hu) http://www.ekultura.hu/hallgatnivalo/ajanlok/cikk/2017-07-13+13%3A00%3A00/roscoe-mitchell-bells-for-the-south-side-cd Von Reinhard Köchl (de) http://www.jazzthing.de/review/roscoe-mitchell-bells-for-the-south-side/ Da Giuseppe Segala (it) http://www.allaboutjazz.com/bells-for-the-south-side-roscoe-mitchell-ecm-records-review-by-giuseppe-segala.php Par Thierry Giard (fr) http://www.culturejazz.fr/spip.php?article3144#rm Por Jesús Gonzalo (es) https://noiself.com/2017/12/roscoe-mitchell-bells-for-south-side/
